#summary Change log for milestones and releases
#labels Featured

==Change Log for version 0.1==

  * Added database rating table in gnizr_db schema that keeps user ratings for bookmarks.
  * Implemented high level design for mockup. Implementation includes Client Javascript code, servlet and java beans to retrieve bookmarks from Gnizr database


==Change Log for version 0.2==

  * Added category field to bookmark_rating table.(Redefined the table) Added unique key (id,category).
  * Refer http://reco-gnizr.googlecode.com/files/Reco-Gnizr.txt  file for more details.
  * Added Http parameter for category in requests.
  * Added Ajax functionality to the front end.

==Change Log for version 0.3==
  * Implemented Http Client to get Client web page contents.
  * Integrated with code for text categorization
  * IE compatibility issues resolved.
